title: ProjectDisplayData
description: Data structure for eww project display with aggregated git status (Feature 120)

is_active.description: True if this is the currently active project

window_count.description: Number of windows associated with this project

worktrees.description: List of worktrees associated with this project

header_git_dirty.description: Git dirty status for project header display (from first worktree) (Feature 120)

header_git_ahead.description: Commits ahead for project header display (from first worktree) (Feature 120)

header_git_behind.description: Commits behind for project header display (from first worktree) (Feature 120)

header_git_merged.description: Merged status for project header display (from first worktree) (Feature 120)

header_git_has_conflicts.description: Conflict status for project header display (from first worktree) (Feature 120)

header_git_additions.description: Line additions for project header display (from first worktree) (Feature 120)

header_git_deletions.description: Line deletions for project header display (from first worktree) (Feature 120)
